title: I was getting daily up-dates of current news online from the Star News.  Why has this stopped? It was the start of my day.
text:
We're still sending them. You might want to check your spam filter.
If you're still having a problem, here's where you can sign up
again:



http://www.starnewsonline.com/apps/pbcs.dll/section?category=manage&template=emailsubscribe
